name: Macross: True Love Song
overview: The year is 2043. The player becomes a Valkyrie pilot aboard a large megalord-class immigrant ship, training and battling to improve his or her combat abilities. The battles are RPG-like command battles, in which you can transform your Valkyrie into a "fighter," "gawk," or "battloid" depending on the situation. As you gain experience, you'll also be able to acquire new aircrafts. And of course, there's the obligatory romance between the pilot and heroine, which is an integral part of Macross. There are three heroines in the game, and their love story unfolds in the adventure mode. And in the end, you'll have to make the ultimate choice.
